The aims of Sure Start are 
to complement the work 
of existing local services 
and provide families with 
advice on where to go and 
who to speak to if they have 
more specialised needs or 
difficulties.	Sure	Start	projects	
do this by:
• improving the ability to 
learn by encouraging 
stimulating play, improving 
language skills and the 
early	identification	and	
support of children with 
learning	difficulties;
